story.kicker_image_caption: Adele with her little fans. Picture courtesy: Instagram/tommydanvers
story.storykicker: This made Adele go, "OMG! OMG! OMG!"
story.storybody:
Just so many things have happened during Adele's on-going world tour that this one almost didn't come as a surprise. Only, it did.

During her performance in Amsterdam on Thursday, Adele randomly picked up two girls from the audience, instantly after which, she realised she knew one of them. Adele, however, knew her from when the girl was just a two-year-old baby, and Adele being Adele, there was a lot of freaking out.

This video was captured by someone in the audience, who uploaded it on Instagram with the caption, "The girl Adele picks from the audience turns out to be the daughter of her cello player. She loses it and shouts out: "OMG I knew you from when you were a baby! (sic)"

 

The girl Adele picks from the audience turns out to be the daughter of her cello player. She loses it and shouts out: "OMG I knew you from when you were a baby!" #adele #amsterdam #baby #ziggodome

A video posted by Atze De Vrieze (@atzedevrieze) on Jun 1, 2016 at 11:59am PDT


Ever since, the video has gone viral.

In the video, Adele can he heard asking the girl where she lives.

"England. In London," the girl says.

"Where in London?" says Adele.

"London London," says the girl.

{mosimage} 

And after a brief pause, what everybody saw was a priceless reaction from the Hello singer. "Oh my god...I knew you when you were a baby! I knew her when she was a baby!" she shouted.

The girl turned out to be the daughter of Adele's cellist, who was then playing at the concert.

Coincidence much?
story.magazinekicker: This made Adele go, "OMG! OMG! OMG!"
story.shortheadline: Why did Adele freak out on stage after seeing two little girls?
